pkgmetadata.longdescription: Measuring Multivariate Dependence Using Distance Multivariance // Distance multivariance is a measure of dependence which can be used to detect and quantify dependence structures. The necessary functions are implemented in this packages, and examples are given. For the theoretic background we refer to the forthcoming papers: B. Bttcher, M. Keller-Ressel, R.L. Schilling (2017) Detecting independence of random vectors I + II. Preprints.
